ygData.subject: Re: list and stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: I did some grouping with some magicians in lavastorm around that level. They are usually there as they do great damage to the elementals.  If you can find a
ygData.messageBody:
I did some grouping with some magicians in lavastorm around that level.
They are usually there as they do great damage to the elementals. If you
can find a cleric there, even better. There seems to be a LOT of creatures
running around there.

the named orc drops the backpack that reduces weight and an idol that has 1
charge of divine aura, does anyone know if it will recharge itself? The
scalps you give to somone in HH and get exp/faction. Unfortunatly I haven't
killed enough orcs and gotten a decent faction.

Little tip, I would sit in the orc spawn and cast darkness or sap str, on
every orc I could. I wouldn't get the exp, but I would get a faction hit
for every one. This might have changed a little as this morning the sap
str, din't seem to give me the message. something to try if you want to
safely go through HH.

Barto.

>
> From: "David" <milamber@...>
>
> Well, I was wondering what to fight when level 15? I have been hunting
> Young Kodies, and weak Kodies in west commons but find the
> respawn rate bad.

>
> As for HH, I attacked some named orc just out side of hh pass, loc -500
> 4300, somewhere around their just watch out for the village, and someone
> told me that he was like killing 10 orcs in high hold pass, for
> just killing
> him. He coned blue to me, but I was just exploring and didn't
> have pet out,
> used HT and it didn't drop him (I figure he has about 300hp, as I
> did 303hp
> to him total), but he died none the less and me with 2 bubbles
> left. I was
> told watch out for his friend that spawns with him on occasion.
> Oh, and he
> bashes, which I really don't like. Plus what are you suppose to
> do with the
> orc scalp?
>
> Anyway anyone know where to hunt alone when you are level 15, no magic
> weapon yet, and not a whole lot of banded armor yet. Or just
> stick to west
> commons. Don't like mummy's because of the rabies thing.
>
> David
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Chris <roysca@...>
> To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 9:38 AM
> Subject: Re: [shadowknight] list and stuff
>
>
> From: "Chris" <roysca@...>
>
> That was a really good response Beld. I currently play an ogre
> shadowknight
> lvl 22 on Povar. I haven't really tried the fear and then chase to get a
> few hits in, but I definitly like the sound of it. I normally hit with a
> darkness spell, then a str sapping spell and melee away. My
> warrior side is
> much better than my spell casting side, so I play the tank
> mostly. I always
> try to group with a cleric if possible. Also, I TOTALLY agree with having
> your pet, I even try to get one when in a group. This morning I was
> fighting in Highpass Hold (MY GOD, how many do I have to kill before I can
> go into HH :) ) and they drop a lot of the rusty weapons. I
> gave my pet a
> rusty mace and he was hitting in the range of 15-18. Very nice little
> addition.
>
> I have almost full bronze on finally, with a few exceptions. I have a
> grotesque mask, and I finally got a greater zweihander (sp), which reminds
> me, i'm selling a 2handed well balanced, magical axe on that server which
> normally sells for about 550 from the shady guy in the
> ecommons/nro tunnel.
> I'm selling it for around 300 if anyone is interested. I am also
> curious as
> to what type of armour/items other ogre sk's are wearing and any
> suggestoins
> they might have.
>
> Chris/Barto.
>
> <Snip>
